Method.name: SubQueryAlias
Method.Implementation: Do ..IsSubQuery() Quit ..TableAlias

Method.name: IsSubQuery
Method.Implementation: Set ..UsedAsSubQuery = $$$YES

Method.name: Delete
Method.Implementation: Set ..Select = "" Set ..Update = "" Set ..Statement = 4 Quit $This

Method.name: Select
Update
Method.Implementation: Set ..Select = "" Set ..Statement = 2 Quit $This

Method.name: Insert
Method.Implementation: Set ..Select = "" Set ..Statement = 3 Quit $This

Method.name: Set
Method.Implementation: Do:((pValue'="")||(pAllowNull=$$$YES)||(..ByParams=$$$YES)) ..AddField(pField, pValue) Quit $This

Method.name: SetIf
Method.Implementation: Quit:pCondition ..Set(args...) Quit $This

Method.name: Column
Method.Implementation:
If ($IsObject(pField)&&($ClassName(pField)=$ClassName($This))) { Do pField.IsSubQuery() Set pField = "("_ pField.GetSQL() _ ")" _ $Case(pField.SubQueryAlias(),"":"",:" As " _ pField.SubQueryAlias()) }
Set:pAlias'="" pField = pField _ " As " _ pAlias Do ..Columns.Insert(pField) Quit $This

Method.name: As
Method.Implementation: Set ..TableAlias = pAlias Quit $This

Method.name: From
Method.Implementation: Set ..From = pFrom Quit $This

Method.name: Where
Method.Implementation: Set result = ..GetStringPrepare(args...) Quit:result="" $This Quit ..WhereInterno(result)

Method.name: WhereInterno
Or
Method.Implementation: Set result = ..GetStringPrepare(args...) Quit:result="" $This Quit ..WhereInterno(result,1)

Method.name: And
Method.Implementation: Set result = ..GetStringPrepare(args...) Quit:result="" $This Quit ..WhereInterno(result)

Method.name: Between
Method.Implementation: Set sql = "(" _ pProp _ " BETWEEN " _ pInferior _ " AND " _ pSuperior _ ")" Quit ..WhereInterno(sql)

Method.name: Join
Method.Implementation: Quit ..InnerJoin(pTable, pFirst, pSecond)

Method.name: InnerJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Inner",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: LeftJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Left",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: LeftOuterJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Left Outer",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: RightJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Right",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: RightOuterJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Right Outer",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: OuterJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Outer",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: FullOuterJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Full Outer",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: CrossJoin
Method.Implementation: Do ..Join.Insert(..JoinPrepare("Cross",pTable, pFirst, pSecond)) Quit $This

Method.name: JoinPrepare
GetStringPrepare
Order
Method.Implementation: Set ..OrderBy = "" Quit ..OrderBy(pOrderBy)

Method.name: OrderBy
Method.Implementation: Set:..OrderBy'="" ..OrderBy = ..OrderBy _ "," _ pOrderBy Set:..OrderBy="" ..OrderBy = pOrderBy Quit $This

Method.name: GroupBy
Method.Implementation: Set:..GroupBy'="" ..GroupBy = ..GroupBy _ "," _ pGroupBy Set:..GroupBy="" ..GroupBy = pGroupBy Quit $This

Method.name: AndIf
Method.Implementation: Quit:pCondition ..And(args...) Quit $This

Method.name: OrIf
Method.Implementation: Quit:pCondition ..Or(args...) Quit $This

Method.name: WhereIf
Method.Implementation: Quit:pCondition ..Where(args...) Quit $This

Method.name: GetSQL
Method.Implementation: Quit:..Statement=1 ..GetSelectStatement() Quit:..Statement=2 ..GetUpdateStatement() Quit:..Statement=3 ..GetInsertStatement() Quit:..Statement=4 ..GetDeleteStatement()

Method.name: GetSelectStatement
GetDeleteStatement
Method.Implementation: Set sql = "Delete " Set sql = sql _ " From " _ ..From Set:..Where'="" sql = sql _ " Where " _ ..Where Quit sql

Method.name: GetUpdateStatement
Method.Implementation: Set sql = "Update " _ ..From Do ..AbstractGetFieldsBlock(.setFieldsStatement) Set sql = sql _ setFieldsStatement Set:..Where'="" sql = sql _ " Where " _ ..Where Quit sql

Method.name: GetInsertStatement
Method.Implementation: Set sql = "Insert INTO " _ ..From _ " " Do ..AbstractGetFieldsBlock(.setFieldsStatement) Set sql = sql _ setFieldsStatement Write sql,! Quit sql

Method.name: Prepare
Execute
%OnNew
Method.Implementation: Set ..From = table Quit $$$OK

Method.name: AddField
Method.Description:
This method is just to insert on %ArrayOfDataTypes property using Key and Value.
'Cos cachÃ© set array inverse (Value, Key)...

Method.name: AbstractGetFieldsBlock
Union
Method.Implementation: Set ..Union = " Union " _ pSQL.GetSQL() Quit $This

Method.name: UnionAll
Method.Implementation: Set ..Union = " Union All " _ pSQL.GetSQL() Quit $This

Method.name: HavingInternal
Having
ByParams
Method.Implementation: Set ..ByParams = $$$YES Quit $This

Method.name: Package
Method.Implementation: Quit "gen.tests"

Method.name: factory
Method.Implementation: Quit ##class(gen.SQLBuilder).%New("sample.person")

Method.name: TestSelect
Method.Implementation: Set sqlBuilder = ##class(gen.SQLBuilder).%New().Select("name, ssn").From("sample.person") Do ..Eql(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),"Select name, ssn From sample.person")

Method.name: TestSelectAll
Method.Implementation: Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().Select().From("sample.person") Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),"Select * From sample.person")

Method.name: TestWhere
TestOrderBy
TestBetween
TestAndCondition
TestComplexWhere
TestFixedArgument
TestSimpleUpdate
TestSimpleInsert
TestUpdateSetCase
Method.Implementation:
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().Update( ).Set("FavoriteColors = (CASE " _"WHEN (Age = 1) THEN 'Red' " _"WHEN (Age = 2) THEN 'Orange' " _"WHEN (Age = 3) THEN 'Yellow' " _"WHEN (Age = 4) THEN 'Green' " _"WHEN (Age = 5) THEN 'Blue' " _"WHEN (Age = 6) THEN 'Purple' END)",,$$$YES)
Do ..Eql(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),"Update sample.person SET FavoriteColors = (CASE " _"WHEN (Age = 1) THEN 'Red' " _"WHEN (Age = 2) THEN 'Orange' " _"WHEN (Age = 3) THEN 'Yellow' " _"WHEN (Age = 4) THEN 'Green' " _"WHEN (Age = 5) THEN 'Blue' " _"WHEN (Age = 6) THEN 'Purple' END)")

Method.name: TestSubQueryOnWhere
TestSelectColumn
TestSubqueryOnSelect
Method.Implementation:
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory( ).Select().Column("ID").Column("Name").Where("Age > ?",10) Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(), "Select ID,Name From sample.person Where Age > '10'" )
Do sqlBuilder.Column(..factory().Select("Age").Where("Age < ?",50).As("Ages"))
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(), "Select ID,Name,(Select Age From sample.person Where Age < '50') As Ages From sample.person Where Age > '10'" )

Method.name: TestTableAlias
TestUnion
Method.Implementation:
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().Where("Age = ?", 10).Union(..factory().Where("Age = ?", 15))
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(), "Select * From sample.person Where Age = '10' Union Select * From sample.person Where Age = '15'")

Method.name: TestUnionAll
Method.Implementation:
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().Where("Age = ?", 10).UnionAll(..factory().Where("Age = ?", 15))
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(), "Select * From sample.person Where Age = '10' Union All Select * From sample.person Where Age = '15'")

Method.name: TestJoin
TestLeftJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Left Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).LeftJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestLeftOuterJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Left Outer Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).LeftOuterJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestOuterJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Outer Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).OuterJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestCrossJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Cross Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).CrossJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestRightJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Right Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).RightJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestRightOuterJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Right Outer Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).RightOuterJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestFullOuterJoin
Method.Implementation:
Set join = "Select P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone "_ "From sample.person As P "_ "Full Outer Join sample.Contact As C On P.ID = C.Person"
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().As("P" ).Select("P.ID, P.Name, P.SSN, C.Email, C.Phone" ).FullOuterJoin("sample.Contact As C","P.ID","C.Person")
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),join)

Method.name: TestJoinSubQuery
TestUpdate
Method.Implementation:
Set id = $Random(10)+1, name = "John Snow", sql = "Update sample.person SET Name = '"_name_"' "_ "Where Id = '"_id_"'", sqlBuilder = ..factory().Update( ).Set("Name", name ).Where("Id = ?",id )
Do ..Is(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(),sql)

Method.name: TestUpdateSetIf
TestHaving
TestByParam
Method.Implementation:
Set sqlBuilder = ..factory().ByParams().Select("Name").Where("Age = ?")
Do ..Exactly(sqlBuilder.GetSQL(), "Select Name From sample.person Where Age = ?")

Method.name: TestMultipleInserts
